name: Robusto Claro 2006
additionalNotes:
This is the best non Cuban smoke I ever had and have.
It´s my reference.
This is the most northerly produced cigar in the world! Grown and rolled in Sweden. The tobacco that have been used is the old Swedeish Åhus tobacco. Last Christmas my girlfriend gave me a bundle. We are now Married. Guess why.

(Read more at www.carlscorona.se)
